parameters.name: InstanceMinCost
parameters.label: Min. daily cost
parameters.description: The minimum cost to be considered for an instance to be reported

paramValidationRules.message: Must be an integer greater than 0

parameters.name: GrowthPercentage
parameters.label: Growth (%)
parameters.description: Cost growth from start to end date

parameters.name: SelectedSubscriptions
parameters.label: Subscription
parameters.query:
resourcecontainers
| where type =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
| project subscriptionId, name

content.query:
let CostStartIndex = 1;
let GrowthFactor = 1 + todouble({GrowthPercentage}) / 100;
let SubscriptionSeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by SubscriptionGuid_g, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by SubscriptionGuid_g
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
let ResourceGroupSeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(ResourceGroupName_s) and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by ResourceGroupName_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by ResourceGroupName_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
let ResourceSeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by InstanceId_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by InstanceId_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
let MeterCategorySeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by MeterCategory_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by MeterCategory_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
let MeterSubCategorySeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and isnotempty(MeterSubCategory_s) and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by MeterSubCategory_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by MeterSubCategory_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
let MeterNameSeries = materialize(AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and SubscriptionGuid_g in ({SelectedSubscriptions:value})
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by MeterName_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by MeterName_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| where StartCost >= 0 and EndCost > {InstanceMinCost} and iif(GrowthFactor > 1, EndCost > (StartCost * GrowthFactor), iif(GrowthFactor < 1, EndCost < (StartCost * GrowthFactor), EndCost == StartCost)));
SubscriptionSeries
| extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
| mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
| summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by SubscriptionGuid_g
| where outliers == 1
| extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'SubscriptionGuid_g', PerspectiveId = SubscriptionGuid_g
| distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
| union (
    SubscriptionSeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'SubscriptionGuid_g', PerspectiveId = SubscriptionGuid_g
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union ( 
    ResourceGroupSeries
    | extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
    | mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by ResourceGroupName_s
    | where outliers == 1
    | extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'ResourceGroupName_s', PerspectiveId = ResourceGroupName_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union (
    ResourceGroupSeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'ResourceGroupName_s', PerspectiveId = ResourceGroupName_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union ( 
    ResourceSeries
    | extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
    | mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by InstanceId_s
    | where outliers == 1
    | extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'InstanceId_s', PerspectiveId = InstanceId_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union (
    ResourceSeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'InstanceId_s', PerspectiveId = InstanceId_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union ( 
    MeterCategorySeries
    | extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
    | mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by MeterCategory_s
    | where outliers == 1
    | extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'MeterCategory_s', PerspectiveId = MeterCategory_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union (
    MeterCategorySeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'MeterCategory_s', PerspectiveId = MeterCategory_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union ( 
    MeterSubCategorySeries
    | extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
    | mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by MeterSubCategory_s
    | where outliers == 1
    | extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'MeterSubCategory_s', PerspectiveId = MeterSubCategory_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union (
    MeterSubCategorySeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'MeterSubCategory_s', PerspectiveId = MeterSubCategory_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union ( 
    MeterNameSeries
    | extend outliers=series_decompose_anomalies(Cost, 1.5)
    | mvexpand outliers, UsageDate_t
    | summarize arg_max(todatetime(UsageDate_t), *) by MeterName_s
    | where outliers == 1
    | extend SeriesType='Outliers', PerspectiveType = 'MeterName_s', PerspectiveId = MeterName_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| union (
    MeterNameSeries
    | extend SeriesType='Growing', PerspectiveType = 'MeterName_s', PerspectiveId = MeterName_s
    | distinct PerspectiveId, SeriesType, PerspectiveType, StartCost, EndCost
)
| extend FirstCost = round(StartCost, 0), LastCost = round(EndCost, 0)
| distinct PerspectiveId, PerspectiveType, FirstCost, LastCost
| top {TopN} by iif(GrowthFactor >= 1, LastCost-FirstCost, FirstCost-LastCost) desc
content.title: Top Growing/Outliers (daily costs)
content.noDataMessage: The query returned no results. Your costs do not have anomalies and are not growing given the conditions filters above.

content.query:
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where {SelectedPerspective} in ('{SelectedPerspectiveId}') and TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize PerspectiveCost = sum(FinalCost) by bin(UsageDate_t, 1d)
| render timechart
content.title: Evolution over time (select growing/outlier cost)

content.query:
let CostStartIndex = 1;
let ContributingInstances = AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
| where {SelectedPerspective} == '{SelectedPerspectiveId}'
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by SubscriptionGuid_g, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by SubscriptionGuid_g
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| top {TopN} by iif({GrowthPercentage} >= 0, EndCost-StartCost, StartCost-EndCost)
| project SubscriptionGuid_g;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and SubscriptionGuid_g in (ContributingInstances)
| where {SelectedPerspective} == '{SelectedPerspectiveId}'
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by bin(UsageDate_t, 1d), SubscriptionGuid_g
| join kind=inner ( 
    AzureOptimizationResourceContainersV1_CL
    | where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}')
    | where ContainerType_s =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions' 
    | extend SubscriptionName = ContainerName_s
    | distinct SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionName 
) on SubscriptionGuid_g 
| project-away SubscriptionGuid_g, SubscriptionGuid_g1
| render timechart
content.title: Top contributing subscriptions over time

| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'

| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by ResourceGroupName_s, UsageDate_t
| order by UsageDate_t asc
| make-series Cost=sum(InstanceCost) on UsageDate_t step 1d by ResourceGroupName_s
| extend StartCost = todouble(Cost[CostStartIndex]), EndCost = todouble(Cost[array_length(Cost)-1])
| top {TopN} by iif({GrowthPercentage} >= 0, EndCost-StartCost, StartCost-EndCost)
| project ResourceGroupName_s;
AzureOptimizationConsumptionV1_CL
| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage' and ResourceGroupName_s in (ContributingInstances)
| where {SelectedPerspective} == '{SelectedPerspectiveId}'
| extend FinalCost = iif('{CostOption}' == 'ActualCosts', todouble(Cost_s), todouble(UnitPrice_s) * todouble(Quantity_s))
| summarize InstanceCost = sum(FinalCost) by bin(UsageDate_t, 1d), ResourceGroupName_s
| render timechart
content.title: Top contributing resource groups over time

| where TimeGenerated > datetime('{CostTimeRange:startISO}') and TimeGenerated < datetime('{CostTimeRange:endISO}') and ChargeType_s == 'Usage'
